text: Hadauchugauaudayauau hadnechauchaunaa, nau hadauchāe hauane nau jauaudane hadjananee, nau jajāvāe hadchuvanee, nau hadauhauauyauau bau3.5 “Bau” probably should be “vau” (meaning “way” or “road”), in line with the rest of the text, since the letter “b” appears nowhere else except in foreign names. hadneyauthauau;
